subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Daly coached the Detroit Pistons’ Bad Boy teams to two N.B.A. championships, then coached the Olympic Dream Team to a gold medal in 1992.
snippet: Daly coached the Detroit Pistons’ Bad Boy teams to two N.B.A. championships, then coached the Olympic Dream Team to a gold medal in 1992.
